audio_generation_models.name: AudioGen Medium
audio_generation_models.description: A text-to-audio model for creating short snippets of sound effects like dogs barking or footsteps in a hallway.

audio_generation_models.name: MusicGen Melody
audio_generation_models.description: A melody-guided music generation model that reimagines a provided melody in a specified style.

prompts: An 80s driving pop song with heavy drums and synth pads in the background

audio_generation_models.name: MusicGen Large
audio_generation_models.description: A text-to-audio model for generating short music samples in specified styles or moods.

prompts: 90s rock song with electric guitar and heavy drums
